proof-title: Scan the QR Code with your Socious Wallet
proof-download-app-desc: Get the most of Socious Wallet by installing our new mobile app.
proof-succeed-desc: Thank you! Your credentials have been verified successfully.
proof-error-desc: An error occurred during the verification process. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
proof-failed-desc: We're sorry, but we couldn't verify your credentials.
